moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bb5 Nd4 4. Nxd4 e: Game is continuing on king side, therefore I preferred Qf3. White has two developed pieces, whereas black has one.
moves.13... Nf6 14. Bg5 Be7 15. O-O O-O 16. Nd: White presses on the open line A.
moves.24... Qe8 25. e5 dxe5 26. Qe4: ..not 26. fxe5, which leads to 26..Qxe5 and white cannot do 27.Bxc6 due to 27..Qe1.

opening: Ruy Lopez (C61), Bird's defence, Paulsen variation
